name: MeanImageFilter
public_declarations: Self &SetRadius( unsigned int r ) { this->m_Radius = std::vector<unsigned int>(3, r ); return *this; }
briefdescription: Applies an averaging filter to an image.
detaileddescription:
Computes an image where a given pixel is the mean value of the the pixels in a neighborhood about the corresponding input pixel.
A mean filter is one of the family of linear filters.
